Name: Proagent: From Robotic Process Automation to Agentic Process Automation
Highlight: Introduces dynamic workflows where agents interpret and execute tasks flexibly, surpassing traditional RPA systems.

Name: Intelligent Agents with LLM-based Process Automation
Highlight: Integrates LLM reasoning capabilities with a modular design that supports task decomposition, object detection, and robust action prediction in GUI environments.

Name: VizAbility: Enhancing Chart Accessibility with LLM-based Conversational Interaction
Highlight: Integrates structured chart navigation with LLM-powered conversational capabilities, enabling visually impaired users to query in natural language.

Name: GPTVoiceTasker: LLM-powered Virtual Assistant for Smartphone
Highlight: Integrates LLMs for natural command interpretation and real-time GUI interactions, using a graph-based local database to record and replicate interactions.

Name: AutoTask: Executing Arbitrary Voice Commands by Exploring and Learning from Mobile GUI
Highlight: Operates without predefined scripts or configurations, autonomously exploring GUI environments.

Name: AssistEditor: Multi-Agent Collaboration for GUI Workflow Automation in Video Creation
Highlight: Employs a multi-agent collaboration framework where agents specialize in roles to integrate user requirements into video editing workflows.

Name: PromptRPA: Generating Robotic Process Automation on Smartphones from Textual Prompts
Highlight: Integrates user feedback loops for continuous improvement, addressing interface evolution and task variability.

Name: EasyAsk: An In-App Contextual Tutorial Search Assistant for Older Adults with Voice and Touch Inputs
Highlight: Combines voice and touch inputs, supplementing incomplete or ambiguous queries with in-app contextual information.

Name: OpenAdapt: Open Source Generative Process Automation
Highlight: Learns task automation by observing user interactions, eliminating manual scripting.

Name: Introduction to AgentSea Platform
Highlight: Offers a modular toolkit adhering to the UNIX philosophy, allowing developers to create custom AI agents for diverse GUI environments.

Name: Open Interpreter: A natural language interface for computers
Highlight: Executes code locally, providing full access to system resources and libraries, overcoming limitations of cloud-based services.

Name: Multion AI: Ai agents that act on your behalf
Highlight: Performs autonomous web actions via natural language commands.

Name: Honor introduces magicos 9.0
Highlight: Leverages MagicLM to understand and execute complex tasks across applications, learning user habits to provide personalized assistance.

Name: Create desktop flows using Record with Copilot (preview)
Highlight: Translates natural language descriptions of desired automations into executable workflows.
